help-file.title: SKILL_REAVER
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all the skills available to the Reaver class.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h slashing, bandage, carve, climb, dodge, double attack, dual wield, first aid, fishing, mine, mount, retreat, scribe, shield block, switch opponents 10th level: sorcerous spell knowledge 11th level: blindfighting, quick chant 18th level: parry 21st level: meditate 26th level: riposte 41st level: trip
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 5th Circle: Baladors Protection, Chill Touch 6th Circle: Ray of Enfeeblement 7th Circle: Ferrix Precision, Lightning Bolt 8th Circle: Dispel Magic, Fireball, Kanchelsis Fury 9th Circle: Eshabalas Vitality, Feeblemind 10th Circle: Firestorm, Immolate 11th Circle: Daragors Flaming Sword, Disintegrate, Squeriks Sneaky Ways
Reaver Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Blood Reaver, Flame Reaver
